episodes.description: Taxis that Carry Dreams: Despite a disability, Yuichi is passionate about art, especially when it's about his other great love: taxis. Follow him as he shares his art with a uniquely gentle touch.
episodes.subtitle: Taxis that Carry Dreams
episodes.title: Spirit of Resilience

episodes.description: Mamma Mercato's Wonder Women: Documents "Mamma Mercato," a non-profit organization that helps moms pursue their dreams, unleash their creativity, and open businesses.
episodes.subtitle: Mamma Mercato's Wonder Women
episodes.title: Spirit of Resilience

episodes.description: Reaching the World from a Wheelchair: Follow Maco as she shares her daily life online, helping people understand the challenges brought by disability and putting a human face on such sensitive issues.
episodes.subtitle: Reaching the World from a Wheelchair
episodes.title: Spirit of Resilience

episodes.description: Finding Home in a Fishing Community: Documents a group of young women who found a new home in Kesennuma City and their efforts together with long-time residents in helping the community.
episodes.subtitle: Finding Home in a Fishing Community
episodes.title: Spirit of Resilience

episodes.description: City Past, Winemaking Future: Documents young former urbanites working to build a future in winemaking with a strong desire to bring Japanese wine to a whole new level.
episodes.subtitle: City Past, Winemaking Future
episodes.title: Spirit of Resilience

episodes.description: Living a More Beautiful Life: Features a beauty salon where the staff work in a personally and professionally balanced environment, bringing a sense of joy to clients and helping everyone to shine.
episodes.subtitle: Living a More Beautiful Life
episodes.title: Spirit of Resilience

episodes.description: Raising Fruit with Style: Documents a group of young farmers in Niigata Prefecture as they try to promote their region through humor and innovative agricultural techniques.
episodes.subtitle: Raising Fruit with Style
episodes.title: Spirit of Resilience

episodes.description: Apples and Pop Idols: Documents "Ringo Musume," an idol group from Aomori Prefecture and their efforts to make a difference in their hometown.
episodes.subtitle: Raising Fruit with Style
episodes.title: Spirit of Resilience

episodes.description: The Big Little World of Tanaka Tatsuya: Documents Tanaka Tatsuya, an artist who creates unique, playful dioramas using food and everyday objects that have earned him millions of fans around the world.
episodes.subtitle: The Big Little World of Tanaka Tatsuya
episodes.title: Spirit of Resilience

episodes.description: Shige's Gift: Sowing Seeds for the Future ? A story of a farmer who received an unexpected gift from a perfect stranger and how he's seeking ways to use the gift to share the joys of farming.
episodes.subtitle: Shige's Gift: Sowing Seeds for the Future
episodes.title: Spirit of Resilience

episodes.description: Dairy Farmers on the Mooove: Documents dairy farmers in Tottori Prefecture as they work to ensure that their local dairy farming tradition continues to flourish.
episodes.subtitle: Dairy Farmers on the Mooove
episodes.title: Spirit of Resilience

episodes.description: Action Figures Lead the Way:Features a tradition-steeped town in Tottori teaming up with a manufacturer of action figures to translate the passion towards Japanese anime and manga into tourist visits.
episodes.subtitle: Action Figures Lead the Way
episodes.title: Spirit of Resilience
